mapper.select:
select t.* from tb_zhongxinzhen t where 1=1
and (t.number like '%${search}%' or t.centertownname like '%${search}%' or t.attributionarea like '%${search}%' or t.townlevel like '%${search}%')
select count(*) from tb_zhongxinzhen t where 1=1
select t.* from tb_zhongxinzhen t where t.centertownid=#{centertownid}
mapper.update: update tb_zhongxinzhen set centertownname=#{centertownname}, number=#{number}, attributionarea=#{attributionarea}, townlevel=#{townlevel}, cooperation=#{cooperation}, townarea=#{townarea}, builtuparea=#{builtuparea}, townpopulation=#{townpopulation}, floatepopulation=#{floatepopulation}, countygdp=#{countygdp}, countyrevenue=#{countyrevenue}, townrevenue=#{townrevenue}, hundredcounties=#{hundredcounties}, citypilot=#{citypilot}, community=#{community}, adminvillage=#{adminvillage}, farmingoutvalue=#{farmingoutvalue}, partycommittee=#{partycommittee}, committelnumber=#{committelnumber}, industryoutvalue=#{industryoutvalue}, mayor=#{mayor}, mayortelnumber=#{mayortelnumber}, serviceoutvalue=#{serviceoutvalue}, weather=#{weather}, terrain=#{terrain}, traffic=#{traffic}, currentindustry=#{currentindustry}, industrialorientation=#{industrialorientation}, honorarytitle=#{honorarytitle}, historyculture=#{historyculture}, statuspic=#{statuspic}, planpic=#{planpic}, docking=#{docking} where centertownid=#{centertownid}
